TopicTitle: Mun ISS challenge *Newbies and Vetrans Welcome*

Articles.Content:
Mission Breifing: Build a ISS orbiting the mun, make sure it atleast has 3 docking ports that have been filled, after that post your picture!

Parts Required: 4 Solar Pannels, 3 Battery Packs

Mods Allowed: Yes, but no Hyper Edit OR MechJeb!

I will be watching for your replies and pictures!
Are you looking for a recreation of the International Space Station in Munar orbit, or simply any space station containing a paltry 4 solar panels and 3 batteries? That's barely a satellite.

Well... I didn't mean that that was it you had to make a space station (not an exact replica of the ISS) but atleast have those things on it, come to think of it that is useless anyways, but the 4 docking ports may be hard for newbies. And yes It has to be in munar orbit
Don't forget to check out the Challenge Guidelines to hep you make a fun and interesting challenge pasta549

Double Post

Edited June 15, 2013 by Doull
double post

If this turns out to be a double post then I am sorry in advance

My Entry for a Space Station Orbiting the Mun

All Stock Parts. No Mechjeb or Hyper Edit were used constructing the Station

10 Solar Arrays

To many Batteries

3 parts docked to the Space Station Core.
